ministry.name: Men's Ministry Purpose Statement
ministry.overview: Allow men to realize the power of God's word and discover all God has in store for them.
Create Godly leaders for our homes, church, and community.
Create healthy brotherhood through Fellowship and Accountability.

long-description.heading: Prayer
long-description.p: The Men's Ministry is about prayer. We call the men to pray for the church. Each Friday morning (6:00 AM) we invite the men to come pray in the New Parent's room. Enter through the church front door.
long-description.heading: Study
long-description.p: The Men's Ministry is about God's word. We desire to see men moved through the power of God's word. This Bible study meets every other Tuesday night (7:00 PM) in the Youth Room. Check the calendar for upcoming meetings.
Our current study will cover Men of Faith from the New Testament. You are welcome to join at any time, as we only study a chapter each meeting.
long-description.heading: Accountability
long-description.p:
The Men's Ministry is about growing together. As iron sharpens iron.
